resources.string: There was an error getting shared preferences. Please close the app and restart it.
We cleared your preferences for which app to send the text with. Next time you send a text, please select which app to use when the prompt comes up.
You cannot turn on location services right now because we do not have access to your phone\'s location. Would you like to give us access?

Turning off location here will stop the app from sending a link to your location but will not rescind the app\'s permission to access it. If you don\'t want the app to be able to access your location anymore, go to your phone\'s settings app and change the permissions there.
This app is useless without access to your contacts. Please give us permission to read your contacts.
This app needs the GPS services to be enabled in order to send your location. Please enable it on the Location Services screen.

string-array.item: Click to select contacts for Group 1
Click to select contacts for Group 2
Click to select contacts for Group 3
Click to select contacts for Group 4

resources.string: This app is a streamlined messaging app. It is not meant to be used instead of 911. \n This app uses code from an outside library te select multiple contacts in the settings page. The library we used, MultiContactPicker, is licensed under the Apache License 2.0. Here is the link to the github repository of the code we used:
Request text field empty. No request added.
Name text field empty. No contact group added.
